title: Average Degree of Graphs Derived From Aperiodic Tilings
authors: Xinyan Xu and Darren C. Ong
abstract:
We consider graphs derived from aperiodically ordered tilings of the plane,
by treating each corner of each tile as a vertex and each side of each tile as
an edge. We calculate the average degree of these graphs. For the Ammann A2
tiling, we present a closed-form formula for the average degree. For the Kite
and Dart Penrose tiling, the Rhomb Penrose Tiling, and the Ammann-Beenker
tiling we present numerical calculations for the average degree.
